features: ST. IVES SMOOTHING BODY LOTION made with rose and argan oil, this moisturizing lotion delivers 100% of the daily hydration your skin needs to glow
QUENCH YOUR SKIN This lush body moisturizer drenches skin with head-to-toe hydration for a silky smooth look and feel
INSPIRED BY NATURE Made with 100% naturally sourced, plant-derived moisturizers, this skin-quenching lotion has a non-greasy formula that absorbs instantly
KEEP CALM AND SMOOTH ON! Tested by dermatologists, this paraben free body lotion is as safe as it is effective, and suitable for even the most sensitive skin
HOW TO USE This body moisturizer is designed for daily use — smooth it on after your shower or bath for all-day hydration and softness. Give your skin that TLC it deserves!
body.description: Smooth skin is always in! Introducing St. Ives Smoothing Body Lotion with Rose and Argan Oil. This lush skin lotion is made with plant-derived, 100% naturally sourced moisturizers for easy-absorbing hydration any time of day. More than just a pretty petal, fragrant rose soothes and smoothes skin, while silky argan oil is renowned for its skin-softening powers. Formulated to give your skin 100% of the hydration it needs to glow, the moisturizer works quickly to smooth and hydrate, and this four pack lasts even longer. This body lotion is paraben free, dermatologist tested, and made with plant-derived ingredients. Delicate enough for sensitive skin, its lightweight formula makes it easy to absorb — so you can just apply it and go. How to use: Squeeze 1 to 2 pumps of hydrating body lotion into your palms and spread over your body from top to toe. Rub in small circular motions with gentle pressure to awaken your skin. Use daily to give your skin that TLC it deserves! At St. Ives, we harness the power of familiar ingredients from nature such as fuzzy apricots, soothing oatmeal, energizing citrus, and more to leave skin feeling clean, bright and refreshed. Discover the bright side of skin care with St. Ives! We use 100% naturally sourced moisturizers in our body lotions, 100% naturally sourced extracts in our body washes, and 100% natural exfoliants in our face scrubs. Try other St. Ives products, including body washes, face scrubs, and lotions for dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, moisturizing, light with lovely fragrance.
reviews.reviewText: It absorbs so there's no heavy film on the skin, but restores moisture and leaves a light Rose fragrance. I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lotion, great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizer-hard to find in brick & mortar shops
reviews.reviewText: This is a good hand and body moisturizer for a reasonable price. I would have preferred not to have to buy 4, but for some reason the grocery and drug stores locally don't often carry the oatmeal and shea butter one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels really good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i have used it for years

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars love the product - but pumps don't work
reviews.reviewText: never bought this brand before. i was looking for a rose scented lotion. the scent is great.but the pumps don't work. not sure if i just got 4 bad pumps or if other folks have thesame issue. so love the lotion. moisturizes your skin, love the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The lotion is very good.
reviews.reviewText: The person I purchased the lotion for has been looking for it on the retail market for 2 years so when I saw it I purchases it and that person is using it. It really moistens the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A staple in my life for years.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this lotion for years. How I came across this for the first time was when I saw it on the clearance shelf at a drug store and thought I try it out. I've been loving it for years. In the last few years I haven't been able to get it in the store anymore or they will stock another scent. The scent is not overwhelming and it has made my skin soft for years. So glad to find it on Amazon.
